item.title: Trump administration’s ban on foreign-made drones starts this week. You can say goodbye to new DJI models.
item.description: It's the latest development in an evolving war between Chinese and American consumer tech products.

item.title: Scientists Found the Deepest Known Arctic Vent—and It’s Teeming With Life
item.description: The deepest recorded cold Arctic vent is a living surprise, researchers say.

item.title: Worrying WhatsApp attack can steal messages and even accounts - here's how to stay safe from "poisoned" attack
item.description: A fork of a popular project was found on npm, but not before it amassed tens of thousands of downloads.

item.title: China Pumps Breaks on Plans to Mass Produce Self-Driving Cars
item.description: Chinese regulators have been slow to approve the mass production and sale of more advanced self-driving tech.

item.title: The Pixel 10, our favorite Android phone, is nearly 50 percent off right now
item.description: If you’re in the market for a new Android smartphone — or on the hunt for a solid last-minute gift — Google’s Pixel 10 is a great place to look. We consider it the best Android phone you can buy, and right now, you can grab it at Amazon starting at $449 ($350 off) when […]

item.title: ServiceNow to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B
item.description: The deal is expected to yield significant returns for Armis investors, including Sequoia, CapitalG, and Insight Partners.

item.title: Collaborative AI agents are key to retail supply chains
item.description: Mastering agentic AI orchestration can help solve disruptions. In a recent meeting with a large retailer, my contact shared that each buyer on her team receives over 100 emails daily referencing data on a variety of topics, from out-of-stock issues and inaccurate pricing to recommendations for driving e-commerce. On the supplier side, the situation is similar: delivering Monday morning reporting to retailers, preparing for line reviews, monitoring out-of-stocks, and pushing new promotions. Emails and Excel are still the primary drivers of the $5 trillion retail industry, in the U.S. alone....

item.title: Of Course Hot Toys’ Absolute Batman Is an Absolute Unit
item.description: The big, beefy take on the Dark Knight is getting a suitably big and beefy figure.

item.title: I've been testing this Eufy robovac for two weeks, and it has some of the best mopping I've seen
item.description: The Eufy E25 Omni is a very good vacuum, but it really shines when it comes to mopping.

item.title: No, it's not a power supply case - this new compact mini PC packs in an Intel Core i9 and a decent Nvidia RTX GPU
item.description: Mavsloly MV10 mini PC packs desktop-class CPU, GPU, mobile workstation-style memory, and four-fan cooling into a visually deceptive small chassis.

item.title: Zoox issues software recall over lane crossings
item.description: The company has issued a software update to its autonomous driving system to fix its lane-crossing behavior.

item.title: IO Interactive's 007 First Light has been delayed until May 27
item.description: IO Interactive's James Bond simulator 007 First Light has been delayed until May 27, 2026. It was supposed to come out in March. The company says two-month delay is for polish and refinement, which is fine by me. I'd always rather wait a bit longer for a better end product. IO says the game is already "fully playable from beginning to end" but still needs a bit of attention to ensure "the strongest possible version at launch." The developer promises to share more updates at the beginning of next year. For the uninitiated, 007 First Light is the first James Bond game in over a decade. The devel...

item.title: Wegovy is coming in pill form. Here’s when, how much, and how well it works
item.description: People who are squeamish about needles will soon have an alternative, as the Food and Drug Administration has approved a pill version of Wegovy that could be available as soon as next month. Novo Nordisk, maker of the GLP-1 weight-loss drug, announced on Monday that it has received FDA approval for its once-daily pill that […] People who are squeamish about needles will soon have an alternative, as the Food and Drug Administration has approved a pill version of Wegovy that could be available as soon as next month....

item.title: The Star of ‘Heated Rivalry’ Looks Back on His Wild ‘Joker: Folie à Deux’ Debut
item.description: Your crush on hockey hottie Connor Storrie is about to ramp up even more when you remember who he played in the Joaquin Phoenix sequel.
